column5: Was down at the lock in Lindsay at lunch and saw some walleye, along with the usual carp, suckers and perch. Water is a little high and stained, but can see them in there. Worth checking out if you're walking by. I guess that means they will spawn early?

It will be interesting to see what affect,if any, this warm weather will have on fishing over the next few months.The weather chanel is saying temps will drop back to more seasonal figures starting this weekend with an announced high of 5 C here on saturday.
